alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 2:59PM CDT until October 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... West central Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Tipton to 6 miles west of Frederick to 6 miles west of Davidson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Frederick, Grandfield, Tipton, Chattanooga, Indiahoma, Davidson, Manitou, Faxon, Elmer, Hollister, Loveland, Fargo, Humphreys, Odell, southwestern Fort Sill, and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
